jobs.title: CAD Designer
jobs.description:
We are looking for an industrial designer/engineer to contribute to the new wave of projects, integrating our technology into cars, gaming consoles and consumer electronic products. Most of our work is very new and confidential, therefore we do not expect high-level conventional expertise or certification. We look for someone who welcomes hands-on problem-solving and is passionate about making real products.

Role
- Conceptualisation, Visualisation
- Deliver manufacturable CAD designs
- Hands-on prototyping and testing.
- Delivering in commercial projects in structural CAD/ product design/mechanical testing/electronics testing.
- Searching/contacting suppliers, and managing supplier relationships.
- Interfacing with corporate clients.

Requirement
- Excellent in prototyping; enjoys hand-making; 
- Has an eye for beauty; perfectionist
- Prolific with CAD tools; knows how to execute
- Creative mechanical engineering problem-solving.
- Knowledge in mass manufacturing, Injection-moulding (plastics preferably).
- Knowledge in basic electronics (Arduino) is a plus.

& Others
- You will be working with brands you heard of, projects that matter and a disruptive technology.
- You will be working within a 15 people diverse team. And you can experience how a product come to life from idea sketches, modelling, prototyping, testing and branding.
- We are based in South London with a nice working environment.

If you are interested, please fill in this pre-interview questionnaire: https://goo.gl/forms/cXe3IzhmHv8l5yJo2. 

Please note that we will not review any applications without a portfolio. Speak soon!

jobs.title: Firmware Embedded System Engineer
jobs.description:
TG0 is an R&D start-up commercialising a platform technology to create novel tactile control products. Our technology leaps into exciting applications: tactile gaming consoles, car interior controls, ergonomic computer peripherals, and high-end interactive products. We are developing the first of our own product application while liaising with major brands in automotive and computer accessory industries. 

We are looking for a full-time member to join our current sensor development. Most of our work is very new and confidential, therefore we do not expect high-level conventional experience. We look for someone who welcomes ground-breaking innovation, hands-on problem-solving and is passionate about making real products.

Role
Deep-dive in a material-based sensing tech, develop a robust and efficient sensing set-up, innovate in tactile sensing area to meet manufacturing and clients’ needs.

Requirement
- Degree or higher qualification in CS or Electronics/EE/MechEng.
- Experience in firmware development and embedded system.
- Skilled in C\C++.
- Prototype evaluation and testing of embedded software development.
- Experience in Arduino, BLE, WiFi, Cap-sensing are pluses.

& Others
- You will be working with brands you heard of, projects that matter and a disruptive technology.
- You will be working within a 20 people diverse team. And you can experience how a product come to life from idea sketches, modelling, prototyping, testing and branding.
- We are based in South London with a nice working environment.

If you are interested, please fill in this pre-interview questionnaire: https://goo.gl/forms/cXe3IzhmHv8l5yJo2. 

Please note that we will not review any applications without a portfolio/work references. Speak soon!

jobs.title: Electrical Electronics Engineer
jobs.description:
OPPORTUNITY
Having secured long-term investments and partnerships, we are looking for an experienced industrial engineer/designer who is interested in a management-oriented role. PCB DESIGN EXPERIENCE IS A MUST.

WHO WE ARE...
We are TG0, a team behind a platform technology. We build 3D interactive control products for automotive, consumer, gaming and aerospace applications. We have built a prolific product portfolio working with well-known fortune 500 companies in various industries.

Our technical development focuses on artificial intelligence algorithms and advanced signal processing to accurately detect variations in touch across flexible uniform interactive surfaces. Our technology can sense pressure, location, speed, and moving direction without embedding metallic sensors, replacing complicated electronic networks with one simple material and smart software algorithms.

We are a team who enjoy each other, who love to have fun and who value beauty, novelty and innovation. We form long-lasting relationships with our customers and partners, We take pride in our teamwork, perfectionism and passions to create things that people have never seen before and love, with effortless and elegant manufacturing.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE WHO... 
- has completed a BSc/MSc/PhD degree in Electrical Engineering or similar field. 
- has a strong understanding of hardware development and 3+ years’ experience with electronics design and development.
- has 2+ years’ experience in PCB DESIGN
- has 2+ years' experience in mass manufacturing and development, including DFM

THE ROLE INCLUDES... 
- Working on a team creating tangible products
- Creating and managing new projects on embedded systems such as Arduino.
- Research and development in electronics, PCB, etc.
- The chance to interact with clients from well-known brands and manufacturers. 
- Pushing the commercialisation of disruptive technology in multiple markets. 

WE ALSO OFFER... 
- Competitive salary + Share options.
- Open and home-like working environment in London. 
- Opportunities to make real products for mass markets such as automotive, aerospace, gaming and IoT.
- Opportunities to work within a diverse team and to directly interface with hardware and design team.
- Full support for self-initiated innovations.

If you believe you are the one, please follow the link and apply TODAY through our online questionnaire: 
https://goo.gl/forms/cXe3IzhmHv8l5yJo2

jobs.description:

Having secured long-term investments and partnerships, we are looking for an experienced sales director who is interested in taking our products and services to market. Work with top brands across various industries, build pipeline, close business, hire and manage a crack sales team of professionals.

WHO WE ARE...
We are TG0, a team behind a platform technology. We build 3D interactive control products for automotive, consumer, gaming and aerospace applications. We have built a prolific product portfolio working with well-known fortune 500 companies in various industries.

Our technical development focuses on artificial intelligence algorithms and advanced signal processing to accurately detect variations in touch across flexible uniform interactive surfaces. We form long-lasting relationships with our customers and partners, We take pride in our teamwork, perfectionism and passions to create things that people have never seen before and love, with effortless and elegant manufacturing.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE WHO... 
- has completed a BSc/MSc/MBA degree in Marketing, Finance, or a similar field
- has 2+ years’ experience in sales and account management etc.. 
- strong deal qualification and closing skills
- able to understand the buying cycle and manage it successfully
- long term mutually beneficial relationship builder
- is able to challenge the status quo and drive new customer product development initiatives
- is personable, friendly, and interested in technology

ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES 
- Own and hit/exceed annual sales targets within assigned territory and accounts

- Partner with customers to understand their business needs and objectives
- Effectively communicate the value proposition through proposals and presentations
- Understand category-specific landscapes and trends
- Reporting on forces that shift tactical budgets and strategic direction of accounts
- Partner with internal and external stakeholders to create value for customers
- Hiring, onboarding, managing and developing high-performing sales team
- CRM management
- Creating pipeline and forecasting revenue in assigned territory

- Competitive salary + attractive bonus structure
